title: Drawing, "Galloping Horse Motif (Beige on Black), Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache on paper, lined.
description: Galloping horse pattern, in sand color, against a black background framed by sand border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Galloping Horse Motif (Beige on Black), Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-91.
